${ModID}:DeadlyDraw.NAME: Deadly Draw
${ModID}:DeadlyDraw.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:ForceOfWill.NAME: Force of Will
${ModID}:ForceOfWill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust this or another card. NL If that card was an Attack, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:HoldTight.NAME: Hold Tight
${ModID}:HoldTight.DESCRIPTION: A card in your hand gains ${ModID}:Flashback !M!. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Insurrection.NAME: Insurrection
${ModID}:Insurrection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each time this card was Exhausted this combat.

${ModID}:PhasingStrike.NAME: Phasing Strike
${ModID}:PhasingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RepressPain.NAME: Repress Pain
${ModID}:RepressPain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted this turn, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust a card.

${ModID}:Resolve.NAME: Resolve
${ModID}:Resolve.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:ShadowShroud.NAME: Shadow Shroud
${ModID}:ShadowShroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

${ModID}:SplitSecond.NAME: Split Second
${ModID}:SplitSecond.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card with ${ModID}:Flashback from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
